## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7621dd08044aeaacb68745078c793611d91031eb9852f8f667f739d485efe939)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'company-browser-package' @ 99.9.10 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
